text: Goran Daničić (; 14 December 1962 – 10 February 2021) was a Serbian actor. He appeared in more than fifty movies. His career began in 1982. He was born in Užice, SFR Yugoslavia. His best known roles were in The Meeting Point, Vukovar, jedna priča, Novogodišnje venčanje, The Robbery of the Third Reich, When I Grow Up, I'll Be a Kangaroo and Ivko's Feast. Daničić died on 10 February 2021 in Belgrade, Serbia at the age of 58.Umro Glumac Goran Daničić: Sahranjen u podne u krugu najuže porodice ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian movie actors
title: Goran Daničić
